title: Robinhood, Nvidia, Carnival: What to Watch When the Stock Market Opens Today
sub_head: Stock futures are slipping and Wall Street’s fear gauge is ticking higher
body:
U.S. stock futures are falling as investors weigh the likely reduction in stimulus measures by the Federal Reserve and rising Covid-19 cases. Here’s what we’re watching ahead of Thursday’s opening bell:
